channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2024020540
item.description:
Report X-2024020540

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-02
  • City: JACKSON
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS LOADING CART TO BRING PACKAGES TO THE CAGE AND SAW THIS PACKAGE. RESPONDER PLACED THE PACKAGE ON THE CART AND WAS DOING SO WITH THIS PACKAGE BUT AS I LIFTED IT, IT STARTED POURING OUT OF THE BOTTOM. RESPONDER NOTICED IT WAS A CORROSIVE SO USED SPILL TRAY AND GOT UP THE SPILL AND PUT THE BOX IN THE SPILL TRAY. RESPONDER PROCESSED THROUGH DMP.

item.title: Report X-2024020524
item.description:
Report X-2024020524

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-31
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package contains 4-1-gallon glass bottles of Octanes. 3 of the bottles got broken and leaked the whole content and destroyed the box. DescribePack: Our package handlers didn't follow loading instruction on the box. (Fragile) DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: collected package from the Van Line and brought it to the QA area to process.

item.title: Report X-2024020501
item.description:
Report X-2024020501

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-15T12:17:17+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-24
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE HAZMAT WAS FOUND LEAKING, AND HANDLED PROPERLY USING THE CORRECT HAZARDOUS MATERIALS. DescribePack: THERE WERE NO HOLES IN THE BOX. THE HAZMAT LEAKED INSIDE OF THE PACKAGE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: THE HAZMAT WAS HANDLED IN THE CORRECT MANNER.
